subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Emmanuel Sanders caught his second touchdown pass from Peyton Manning to tie the game with 36 seconds to play, and Bradley Roby then returned a Jamal Charles fumble 21 yards for a touchdown as Denver beat Kansas City.
snippet: Emmanuel Sanders caught his second touchdown pass from Peyton Manning to tie the game with 36 seconds to play, and Bradley Roby then returned a Jamal Charles fumble 21 yards for a touchdown as Denver beat Kansas City.
